name: meteor-coverage
description: A meteor package that allows you to get the statement, line, function and branch coverage of Meteor project and package.   This package uses the [istanbuljs](https://github.com/istanbuljs/istanbuljs) packages for coverage report.   It's a debug only package, so it does not affect your production build.

scripts.setup-test: rm -rf ./test && meteor create --bare test && cd test && meteor npm i --save selenium-webdriver@3 chromedriver && ln -s ../../../ ./packages/meteor-coverage
scripts.test: meteor npm run setup-test && cd test && TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_LCOVONLY=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test-packages --once --settings ./packages/meteor-coverage/.coverage.json --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ./packages/meteor-coverage
scripts.test:watch: TEST_WATCH=1 COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test-packages --settings .coverage.json  --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ./
scripts.start: meteor npm run lint:fix & meteor npm run test:watch
